name: Accurate
restriction: Only for attack powers against defenses
effect: +2 bonus to hit

name: Aquatic Power
restriction: Perk: power with range; Flaw: works poorly outside water
effect: Perk: full range underwater; Flaw: halved range outside water

name: All-Skill
restriction: Only specific powers; no other mods except Linked, Fatiguing
effect: Power from skill alone; score capped at 20; +1 Burnout if applicable

name: Conditional
restriction: Power only works in specific conditions
effect: Useless at least half the time (e.g., only at night)

name: Critical Depletion
restriction: Power must have Burnout value
effect: Auto-burnout on every use

name: Cybernetic Implant
restriction: Cannot be combined with Removable Item
effect: May malfunction on Massive Damage; reboot with Plot Point

name: Distant Power
restriction: Ranged powers only
effect: Double the range

name: Dual-Natured Attack
restriction: Must deal damage
effect: Applies two energy types simultaneously

name: Exclusive Power
restriction: Scene/Continuous powers only, must apply to 2+ powers
effect: Activating one power deactivates all others with this flaw

name: External Power Source
restriction: Power must have Burnout
effect: Shared burnout pool; burnout threshold based on modifiers

name: Fatiguing
restriction: Must have Burnout; cannot be combined with burnout-reduction mods
effect: Increases Burnout cost by half (min 1)

name: Instinct Control
restriction: Mental powers only
effect: Affects animals or computers (or both at -4)

name: Joined Power
restriction: Cannot apply to All-Skill powers
effect: Must be near another hero to use power

name: Limited Uses
restriction: No Burnout when using
effect: Use twice per short rest (+2), once per short rest (+4), or once per long rest (+6)

name: Linked
restriction: Requires 2+ powers to share source/theme
effect: All powers are treated as part of one theme or origin

name: Penetrating
restriction: Only for powers that attack defenses
effect: Bypasses DR equal to Â½ your power score modifier (min 1)

name: Removable Item
restriction: Power is built into an item
effect: Can be stolen/disarmed

name: Roulette Power
restriction: Cannot be used with Continuous or Exclusive Power; must apply to 2+ powers
effect: Randomly determine which power activates

name: Secondary Effect
restriction: Spend bonus action and succeed vs. secondary defense
effect: Apply secondary condition once per scene

name: Seeking
restriction: Ranged powers only
effect: Ignore cover penalties and melee targeting penalties

name: Spell Power Infusion
restriction: Requires Magical Spell flaw
effect: Spend Plot Point to increase score by +2 (max = Wisdom)

name: Static
restriction: Power cannot be improved, may only be taken at creation
effect: Power is locked forever

name: Synergy
restriction: Must have Synergy keyword
effect: One power controls advancement for all synergized powers

name: Unpowered Form
restriction: Common on Armor; must take time to activate
effect: Requires 2 Demanding actions (or 1 with -2 to bonus)
